name: Offer an Idol to Madame Tusk
Slay Hundun and return to the surface
Ride all 3 living mounts at least once
Befriend Qilin on a Volcana/Tide Pool run
Kill 7 NPCs in one run, excluding HH, Shopkeeps, and Bodyguards
Defeat the Yeti Queen and Yeti King
Kill a Salad Sister in the Ice Caves
Snap any back item in a Bear Trap
Carry a Webgun through 4 levels consecutively
Snap a Shopkeeper in a Bear Trap
Obtain a total of 5 Hired Hands at once (Not all alive required)
